alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 22 at 1:51PM CDT until April 22 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions This Afternoon and Evening... ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Possible Again Saturday Afternoon... ...A Red Flag warning is in effect until 9 PM CDT this evening for Valley, Dawson and Gosper counties in south central Nebraska... * WINDS...South 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
